content: The huge Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai will emerge as soon as you attempt to harvest the mushroom. Immediately, he'll leap up and try to hit you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass III' and the sub-subsection 'Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai'.
The content is as follows:
The huge Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai will emerge as soon as you attempt to harvest the mushroom. Immediately, he'll leap up and try to hit you.
